publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5626 Donald Gorrie on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Scottish Commission for Public Audit—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 10th Report, 2006 (Session 2), Scottish Commission for Public Audit and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from the day after the Parliament is dissolved at the end of the current session.

S2M-5626 Donald Gorrie on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Scottish Commission for Public Audit—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 10th Report, 2006 (Session 2), Scottish Commission for Public Audit and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from the day after the Parliament is dissolved at the end of the current session.

S2M-5626 Donald Gorrie on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Scottish Commission for Public Audit—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 10th Report, 2006 (Session 2), Scottish Commission for Public Audit and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from the day after the Parliament is dissolved at the end of the current session.
S2M-5626 Scottish Commission for Public Audit (lodged on 21 February 2007) Karen Gillon* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
